name: Reconnaissance - Gather Victim Organization Information (T1591)
description: Detects attempts to gather organization-related information such as domain, forest, organizational unit, and Active Directory structure. Adversaries use this information during reconnaissance to understand the target environment.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe) AND (process.args:(*Get-ADDomain* OR *Get-ADForest* OR *Get-ADOrganizationalUnit* OR *nltest* OR */dclist* OR *net config workstation* OR *dsquery* OR *systeminfo*))
